head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ABRAMS, IRENE (NEE SCHWARTZ)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ABRAMS, IRENE (NEE SCHWARTZ)

block.p: ABRAMS-Irene (nee Schwartz). Of Forest Hills, New York, on September 3, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Harry. Loving mother of Jay. Dear aunt of Fern Schwartz Thomas. Graduate of New York University Law School Class of 1926. A Committal service is on Wednesday, 11 AM, at Beth David Cemetery, Elmont, New York.

ABRAMS-Irene (nee Schwartz). Of Forest Hills, New York, on September 3, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Harry. Loving mother of Jay. Dear aunt of Fern Schwartz Thomas. Graduate of New York University Law School Class of 1926. A Committal service is on Wednesday, 11 AM, at Beth David Cemetery, Elmont, New York.
